title: Reinforcement Learning-Based HVAC Energy Optimization Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic HVAC system principles, energy management concepts, and foundational Python/machine learning skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on practical HVAC control optimization using EnergyPlus simulation and Deep Q-Networks (DQN), including climate-specific energy-saving strategy analysis and real-world applications.

learning_goals: Optimal HVAC system operation strategies can be designed using a reinforcement learning-based DQN model.
Energy savings of over 5% can be achieved through efficient partial load ratio range operation in multi-chiller systems.
Trade-offs between energy efficiency and computational costs can be analyzed by adjusting control cycles (10/60 minutes) based on climate conditions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
